title: Capitol Reef National Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Looking for more information?  News Browse news releases and follow us on Facebook and Twitter to find out news as it is happening in the park.  Photos & Multimedia Explore photo galleries, watch videos, or see the park in real time with the Pleasant Creek webcam. History & Culture People have lived in what is now Capitol Reef National Park for many years. Read the stories of these people to understand why Capitol Reef is so special.  Nature Capitol Reef supports a variety of unique ecosystems. Discover the plants, animals, geology, and environmental factors that make Capitol Reef so diverse.  Management Want to learn about who we are? What our guiding principles are? Here you will find out our laws and policies. Fact Guide for Capitol Reef National Park Want to learn the facts and history of Capitol Reef? The timeline of events that led to its designation? Here you will find the document to help you learn all about the park.
